headline: European Alternatives
subtext: Discover European and open-source alternatives to US tech giants. Support digital sovereignty, data privacy, and local innovation.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: European services built with privacy-first principles and strict data protection

sovereignty.title: Digital Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Keep your data in Europe, under European law and jurisdiction

openSource.title: Open Source Options
openSource.description: Transparent, auditable, and community-driven software you can trust

disclaimer.title: No one's perfect — and we know it
disclaimer.text: Every service listed here has its own trade-offs. Some are fully open source, others aren't. Some have had incidents in the past, others are simply young and unproven. We include known reservations where we can, and we encourage you to do your own research. The goal isn't to present a flawless list — it's to show that credible European options exist.

communityNote: This is a community-driven project. None of these listings are ads or sponsored — we are not paid for any of them. We cannot guarantee the quality of any listed service; most are recommendations by the community. Contributions welcome!
